messages.content: You will shortly be receiving your postal ballot papers for the General Election. With that in mind I would like to take this opportunity to outline some of my achievements and campaigns whilst representing you over the years and to tell you why I am standing for re-election.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Successfully campaigned for protecting leaseholders, introducing legislation to outlaw the misuse of fireworks.
Ensured the post office card account was retained.
Persuaded the government to protect local churches, voluntary groups and sports clubs from excessive water charges.
Campaigned vigorously to keep fluoride out of public drinking water.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Winter Fuel Payments and Free TV Licenses
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Worked to ensure the continuation of winter fuel payments and free TV licenses and bus passes.

housing.content: Successfully campaigned for protecting leaseholders, introducing legislation to outlaw the misuse of fireworks.

leaflet.personalStatement: I care passionately about Bolton and our local community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigned on many issues and have always tried to be the voice of Bolton in Westminster and not the voice of Westminster in Bolton.

images.caption: Re-elect David Crausby A proven record as Bolton's MP

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed and published by Paul Richardson on behalf of the Labour Party, both of 60 St Georgeâ€™s Road, Bolton, BL1 2DD. Reproduced from an electronic original.
